repositories.name: list-cutter
repositories.customDescription: Ceci n'est pas un CRM. Now with a friendly cuttlefish chat agent!
repositories.extendedDescription: Cutty the cuttlefish (not an octopus) is your BEST FRIEND and he is here to help you do stuff with voter contact data! Not a CRM. Uses a comically unhelpful though slightly agentic chat friend, which is neat.

repositories.name: games
repositories.customDescription: Games I have made. Kinda shitty, kinda not

repositories.name: chat-bgd
repositories.customDescription: My mom insists on calling ChatGPT 'ChatBGD' so I made this using gpt-oss hosted on a Cloudflare AI Worker.

repositories.name: chesscom-helper
repositories.customDescription: I wanted a thing to email me when certain chess players started playing live matches! built on Cloudflare Workers that tracks player activities and sends notifications.

repositories.name: SuperClaude
repositories.customDescription: My fork of the SuperClaude project. Slightly unhinged. --persona-critic is the real MVP

repositories.name: dotfiles
repositories.customDescription: Custom configurations for Kitty (terminal) and AeroSpace (window management). Extremely advanced. Big-brain users ONLY.

repositories.name: cloudflare-ai-worker
repositories.customDescription: Runs open source AI models supported by Cloudflare (currently gpt-oss). Neat!

repositories.name: zoo
repositories.customDescription: An homage to a simpler time.

repositories.name: web-app-starter-pack
repositories.customDescription: I made this before realizing Cloudflare already has C3, which is this but better. Oh well lmao

repositories.name: web-app-starter-pack-gcp
repositories.customDescription: A starter project for web apps deployed from Google Cloud Run. Lol that Makefile is most of the code

repositories.name: naptime
repositories.customDescription: I wanted to take Google Cloud Run for a spin so I hooked up the Oura API to put together this horrible thing
